oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1958-09-17 Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: law; libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Dwyer, John T. "Buddy"; Randolph, Wassell; City Commission; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from City Commissioner John T. Dwyer to Wassell Randolph: "Dear Mr. Randolph, -- Thank you very much for the most informative letter and may I congratulate you and the other Board members in the sound judgment and also, wish you every success in the outcome of this unwarranted lawsuit. -- Sincerely, John T. Dwyer, Commissioner -- Department of Public Service"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dwyer, John T.
